build: corepack enable || true; corepack prepare pnpm@8.15.9 --activate; pnpm install --frozen-lockfile=false; if node -e "const p=require('./package.json');process.exit(p.scripts&&p.scripts.build?0:1)"; then pnpm run build; else echo '[forgeon] no build script; skipping'; fi
start: corepack enable || true; corepack prepare pnpm@8.15.9 --activate; if node -e "const p=require('./package.json');process.exit(p.scripts&&p.scripts.start?0:1)"; then pnpm start; elif node -e "const p=require('./package.json');process.exit(p.scripts&&p.scripts.dev?0:1)"; then pnpm dev; else node server.js; fi

build_meta.notes: For Hono playgrounds that only have scripts.dev (tsx), Forgeon will run dev as a fallback. Add scripts.start for production.
